features: Perfect Compatibility for ROVE R2-4K Dash Cam and AZDOME M01 Pro/M17/GS65H: The ball dia of the dashcam mount is 0.63inch. For easy installation, please make sure the car rearview has (MORE THAN 0.4 INCH) space on the back of the mirror.

Clear Unobstructed View: Mount your dash cam behind the center of the windshield to make safe driving, since it allows them to record a clear unobstructed view ahead and doesn't interfere with the view when driving.

Easy to Install & Removed: Come with two long screws and two short screws, From 0.5- 2.6 inches. Tool-less and easy to install & removed, the mirror dash cam mount would be easy to lock on car rearview mirror/bike/motorcycle handlebar and any round pipe dia.

360° Rotation Freedom: The dashcam mirror mount is completely at your disposal. Adjustable ball and socket joint, real 360-degree rotation design, adjust to any angle you need, be it horizontally or vertically.

Prevents Slipping and Breaking and Heat-resistant: Position fixing with practical locking nut, durable construction prevents slipping and breaking and heat-resistant, dashcams for cars never fall off the windshield.
Worry-Free Aftersales: If you’re having any doubts, it comes with a Full Refund within 30 DAYS. As always, AZDOME promises you 24/7 online customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to install. No extra tools required. Note: The ball dia of the dashcam mount is 0.63inch. For easy installation, please make sure the car rearview has (MORE THAN 0.4 INCH) space on the back of the mirror. Where should you mount your dash cam? The best position is right down the center of the windshield, about a few inches down from the headliner. As it allows the car camera to record a clear unobstructed view of the road ahead, and doesn’t interfere with the view whatsoever when driving. If your dashcam comes with this mirror mount, you should leave enough space so that the device can be easily installed. Perfect Compatibility for ROVE R2-4K Dash Cam and AZDOME M01 Pro/M17/GS65H: The ball dia of the dashcam mount is 0.63inch. For easy installation, please make sure the car rearview has (MORE THAN 0.4 INCH) space on the back of the mirror.Clear Unobstructed View: Mount your dash cam behind the center of the windshield to make safe driving, since it allows them to record a clear unobstructed view ahead and doesn't interfere with the view when driving.Easy to Install & Removed: Come with two long screws and two short screws, From 0.5- 2.6 inches. Tool-less and easy to install & removed, the mirror dash cam mount would be easy to lock on car rearview mirror/bike/motorcycle handlebar and any round pipe dia.360° Rotation Freedom: The dashcam mirror mount is completely at your disposal. Adjustable ball and socket joint, real 360-degree rotation design, adjust to any angle you need, be it horizontally or vertically.Prevents Slipping and Breaking and Heat-resistant: Position fixing with practical locking nut, durable construction prevents slipping and breaking and heat-resistant, dashcams for cars never fall off the windshield.AZDOME provide camera accessory. If you need it, AZDOME will help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with ROVE R2-4K PRO Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I got these so I could do a somewhat permanent, non suction cup mount for each of my 3 cars for the ROVE R2-4K PRO Dash Cam. I had to buy some longer screws at Homedepot for one of the cars as that car had an exceptionally thick mirror bracket. I wish the wing nuts did not turn so freely. They come undone over time and take a minute or two to tighten up again. I am going to try to put some locktite on the screws next time they come loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Well For The Rove R2-4K Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I only got this mount yesterday, so this is for first impressions, only.It’s a metal and plastic mount, so I feel like this will wear out if you have to make adjustments, frequently, but so far, there hasn’t been any need for adjusting the mount after the initial installation.Speaking of which, installing this mount onto the mirror was quite simple and straightforward, as well as the installation instructions – on top of that, the mount for the Rove dash camera was already on the anchor, which eliminated the hassle of figuring out how to install the mount, whether or not that would have been simple to do, as well.It seems like a good substitute/replacement for Rove’s suction cup mount and I won’t have to worry about the camera falling off the windshield if the glass is dirty or the variation in temperature caused the cup to lose its suction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great attachment accessory for Azdome dashcam
reviews.reviewText: This is a good sturdy dash cam mirror mount at an excellent budget price. It's compatible with the ball attachment that came with the original suction mount from the main Azdome M16 camera package, but none of the additional ball attachments provided in this item are compatible with attaching the M16. (In summary, you won't get a duplicate attachment for the M16.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera mount.
reviews.reviewText: Conveniently attaches to the mirror holder. There are several mounting options. Includes holders for different cameras. I recommend the product and the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not fit the Rove Camera.
reviews.reviewText: The ears on the tab are too wide to fit in camera groves. You have to modify the ears to fit, but be careful or it will be too loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than suction cup
reviews.reviewText: I was using the suction cup that came with my Rove dash cam and it constantly fell when my car was parked and even sometimes while driving. It was horrible! Finally bought this dash cam holder and much better. It's easy to install and very sturdy. Doesn't move at all. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install. No vibration. No suction cup failing in the sun.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. No vibration. No suction cup failing in the sun.Make sure the “stalk” your mirror is on has at least about an inch exposed for it to mount on.One added bonus. My wife can use her windshield sun shade again!(It didn’t fit with the camera suction cup mounted, but fits behind the camera now).
Easy to installPerfect for the purpose

The Dash Camera Mirror Mount Holder Kit is a huge improvement and does not require a suction cup, or adhesive mount to the windshield. It mounts directly to the rear view mirror mount. Very stable and won't come off in high temperatires.
It a holder not a camera and it has many parts maybe one day will use it as right now using the mount on the camera.
